dcterms:description: A dataset gathered from Scopus, which is the largest abstract and citation database, containing features of expert candidates such as their subject areas, affiliations, h-index, and their co-author interactions.
dcterms:title: Scopus

dcterms:creator: R. Zafarani
H. Liu
dcterms:description: A social blog directory where nodes represent bloggers and edges show the friendship connections among them. Each blogger is labeled by at least one category that represents their interests.
dcterms:title: BlogCatalog

dcterms:creator: A. Chatr-Aryamontri
R. Oughtred
L. Boucher
J. Rust
C. Chang
N. K. Kolas
L. O'Donnell
S. Oster
C. Theesfeld
A. Sellam
C. Stark
B. J. Breitkreutz
K. Dolinski
M. Tyers
dcterms:description: A biological network where nodes are proteins and edges indicate the pairwise physical interactions between proteins in humans. The labels of nodes are obtained from the protein-coding gene sets.
dcterms:title: Protein–Protein Interactions (PPI)

dcterms:creator: M. Mahoney
dcterms:description: A network of co-occurrence words related to Wikipedia’s articles, where node labels indicate the Part-of-Speech (POS) tags assigned to the nodes.
dcterms:title: Wikipedia

dcterms:creator: J. Leskovec
A. Krevl
dcterms:description: A collaborative network constructed from the collaborations between authors’ papers submitted to the e-print arXiv in the Astro Physics category. Nodes represent authors and edges express the co-authored relationships.
dcterms:title: arXiv (Astro-PH)
